experience: You and Ryan both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Cliff Schertz, and 33 others
Why We Collaborated to Define Our Core Values and So Should You - Bolste | Collaboration, Business and Video Chat, File Sharing & Task Management Software

Join LawLogix a Division of Hyland Software!  We are currently hiring for multiple positions. Start the new year off with a new career at a great company. Message me for more info or visit our careers page https://lnkd.in/eWw8Pt7
Hyland’s game-changing deal - Smart Business Magazine

Leading the LawLogix division of Hyland Software, Inc.  Responsible for the division's departments, P&L and revenue generating activities.   Still directly leading the sales, marketing, channels, training and account management teams.  We have a great team and a passion for delivery of best in class electronic I-9 and immigration case management SaaS products and services.  And now with the resources and backing of Hyland Software, Inc., one of the best names in ECM software, we look forward to a tremendous 2017.

Leading the sales, marketing, channel, and account management teams at LawLogix.  Our customers range from Fortune 10 companies to law firms across the world.  LawLogix is a leading solution provider that assists millions of people through its Electronic I-9 Compliance, E-Verify & Immigration Case Management Software. With two flagship Software as a Service (SaaS) products, Guardian and EDGE, LawLogix automates the labor and paper intensive I-9 and immigration processes for more than 165,000 organizations worldwide.

Served as sales and marketing consultant for two of the top SaaS companies located in Phoenix, Arizona, creating new go-to-market strategies and creating and implementing the related processes required for execution.  Companies served:  Axosoft (www.axosoft.com) and LawLogix (www.lawlogix.com). Axosoft:Retained to help create new go-to-market strategies, helped build sales team, and helped build sales and marketing processes for this top scrum software provider.  Axosoft provides scrum and project management software for thousands of development teams worldwide and is consistently ranked as one of Arizona’s top technology companies.  •	Created new sales process for Axosoft product suite team.•	Led CRM implementation for the new sales process.•	Assisted in the hiring of new sales team members.•	Planned and helped execute an extensive Objective-driven Innovation project to initiate new product innovation based upon the job needs and objectives of customers.•	Assisted in creation of 2015-2017 strategic plan.•	Led creation of new metrics dashboard for overall sales and marketing effectiveness.LawLogix:Retained to help build overall product management processes for the primary LawLogix product – Guardian I-9 compliance software.  Lawlogix is a top SaaS technology provider with clients ranging from Fortune 100 companies to small businesses. •	Development of overall strategic product plan.•	Creation and implementation of product go-to-market strategy.•	Analysis and development of pricing plans and models.•	Integration of overall product plan with sales and channel strategies.•	Migration of underlying technology development into new Agile process.•	Development of key revenue projection modeling.
Chief Revenue Officer (Sales, Marketing, Business Development)

Appointment-Plus is a Software as Service (SaaS) solution - think Open Table for every other kind of booking/appointment.  I was the Chief Revenue Officer and an executive team member  responsible for sales, business development, and marketing within this niche cloud computing company serving nearly 100 verticals. I led the sales and business development growth at Appointment-Plus from only 300 accounts to over 7,500 accounts ranging from Fortune 50 companies (i.e. Google, Verizon) to SMBs, booking over 3,000,000 appointments per month worldwide through the Appointment-Plus system.  We increased Appointment-Plus revenues by 550% under my sales and marketing leadership.  SaaS business models can be incredibly complicated, but it is a great model and great business.  SaaS metrics and SaaS financial modeling - making all the pieces work - was also part of what I did at Appointment-Plus.Here's a quick blurb about Greybull Stewardship's 2010 investment in Appointment-Plus:  http://greybullstewardship.com/investment-appointment-plus/

Responsible for overall business development, sales and marketing strategies for all major verticals and major accounts. Built and managed 14-person sales team including compensation plans and entire customer-focused sales process from the ground up. Analyzed successful sales techniques and methods for SaaS companies to open each stage of the sales funnel. Extensive experience with contracting and SaaS contract issues. Development of complete enterprise level contract set. Authored all product terms and conditions.

summary: Software, creativity, entrepreneurship, and fun - kind of sums up the environment I like to work in.  I left the law practice for a career in software sales and marketing several years ago and never looked back.  Since that time I've had the opportunity to be involved in so many great things at SaaS startups, including Appointment-Plus, a leading cloud scheduling provider, Lawlogix, and Axosoft.  Helping to build SaaS startups is a lot of fun.
